headline: Cuomo complains ‘cancel culture’ and dirty politics ruined his career in speech at NYC church
author: Reuven Fenton & Sam Raskin
sentences: In his first public appearance since resigning last year, the accused serial sexual harasser whined about his explosive scandal to about 150 congregants at God’s Battalion of Prayer in East Flatbush, calling it “probably the toughest time of my life.”(Snip)“My behavior has been the same for 40 years in public life.

Andrew Cuomo is guilty of being exceedingly virile and sexy, and also of not being fully in tune with how modern women are not supposed to be groped and urged to "eat the entire sausage," because that's how busy he was trying to serve the people of the great state of Noo Yawk.
Andrew Cuomo turned a Brooklyn church appearance into a 25-minute gripe session Sunday in which he again blamed “cancel culture,” the media and “political sharks” driving him out of office.
Because for some people, especially younger people, there’s a new sensitivity.
Go on, chumps, put him back in office and burnish him for the national stage.
We know you're powerless to resist his magnetism.

No one ever told me
Comments:
Defiant ex-Gov.
… But that was actually the problem.
